Name: The Globetrotter
Ingredients: 40 ml Bacardi Carta Blanca Superior White Rum
5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. Special ingredient #1 : Quince juice
History: Polish Bacardí Legacy 2014 winning cocktail created by Rafal Nawrot at Sky Bar in Qubus Hotel-Prestige, Katowice, Poland.
Nutrition: One serving of The Globetrotter contains 129 calories
Garnish: Blueberry, lemon zest twist & mint sprig.
